price: 77. Lalu ketika dia melihat bulan terbit dia berkata, “Inilah Tuhanku.” Tetapi ketika bulan itu terbenam dia berkata, “Sungguh, jika Tuhanku tidak memberi petunjuk kepadaku, pastilah aku termasuk orang-orang yang sesat.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلۡقَمَرَ بَازِغٗا قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّيۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَئِن لَّمۡ يَهۡدِنِي رَبِّي لَأَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā raā al-qamara bāzighan qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla la-in lam yahdinī rabbī la-akūnanna mina al-qawmi al-ḍālīna
